name: Teraphobia Demo
description:
This is a short horror game demo which I have been developing part time for almost a year. 

The game requires the player to use a bolt action rifle which they must reload themselves using the arrow keys (the sequence of keys will appear on screen) after each shot. This deliberately forces the player to move one hand either off the movement controls or mouse to reload the gun while making them vulnerable to being killed by the monster.

I will be continuing on with the project as right now this is just a demo showing the rifle and AI system. I will like to create more levels, more gun types that can be reloaded using the arrow keys and more monster types. 

For more details about this project's development please check out my blog: https://amulliganblog.wordpress.com/category/ilp/
